main event: A group of witnesses reported seeing unidentified lights in the sky over Presque Isle State Park, Pennsylvania on July 31, 1966.
interesting points: Witnesses reported lights that hovered and then shot straight up into the sky,Three witnesses confirmed the sighting, with one reporting an object glowing bright white and emitting a reddish-orange hue,The lights changed colors from red to green, then white during the observation,No photographic evidence was clear or conclusive,The investigation noted the presence of strange indentations in the sand at the park, which were unrelated to the reported sighting.
location: Presque Isle State Park, Pennsylvania, USA
witness description: A group comprising three individuals who reported seeing the lights, including a 16-year-old girl and her friends.
